Leaves: Alternate, undivided, with mosty smooth edges, narrowing towards base, leathery.
Flowers: Yellow daisy-like flowerheads with 11-13 petals, 10-20 mm across.
FruitSeeds: Fleshy, blackish, egg-shaped fruit 6-8 mm in diameter. Containing a single dark brown to black seed.
DistinguishingFeatures: Fruit egg-shaped,  and leaf margins mostly smooth compared to Boneseed (*Chrysanthemoides monilifera subsp. monlifera*).
